org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.adapter.statistics

Class StatsCompositionTool<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.adapter.statistics.StatsCompositionTool<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Entry type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable, DeleteCallback<T,GeoWaveRow>, IngestCallback<T>, ScanCallback<T,GeoWaveRow>

    public class StatsCompositionTool<T>
extends Object
implements IngestCallback<T>, ScanCallback<T,GeoWaveRow>, DeleteCallback<T,GeoWaveRow>, AutoCloseable, Closeable, Flushable
    This tool does not react to callbacks if the provided statistics store is null or the provided data adapter does not implement DataStatisticsStore.

      • entryScanned

        public void entryScanned(T entry,
                         GeoWaveRow kv)
        Description copied from interface: ScanCallback
        This will be called after an entry is successfully scanned with the row IDs that were used. Deduplication, if performed, occurs prior to calling this method.

        Without or without de-duplication, row ids are not consolidate, thus each entry only contains one row id. If the entry is not de-dupped, then the entry this method is called for each duplicate, each with a different row id.

        Specified by:
        entryScanned in interface ScanCallback<T,GeoWaveRow>
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry that was ingested
        kv - the raw row scanned from the table for this entry
